continental.description: A network of farms and ranches surrounds the cities and small towns near the Nebraskaâ€“Iowa border.

maritime.description: Phytoplankton blooms across the northern basins of the North Atlantic and Arctic Oceans.

coastal.description: The pristine sand dunes near the launch pads at KSC are gently washed by the calm blue Atlantic Ocean.

mountains.description: The Cuernos del Paine mountains in Torres del Paine National Park, Chile, during NASA's AirSAR 2004 campaign.

island.description: The Republic of Maldives with its twenty-six atolls, and 1192 coral islands, with an average ground elevation of 1.5 meters (about 5 feet).

desert.description: The lidar on its tripod. NASA/GSFC

forest.description: Tropical forests, such as those in Gabon, Africa, are an important reservoir of carbon. (Photography courtesy Sassan Saatchi, NASA/JPL-Caltech.)

urban.description: The narrow island of Manhattan, located between the Hudson River and the East River.

agricultural.description: Variegated green crop circles cover what was once shortgrass prairie in southwestern Kansas.

polar.description: A NASA scientific balloon awaits launch in McMurdo, Antarctica.

sea ice.description: Sea ice hugging the coast of East Greenland.

coral.description: Great Barrier Reef near Whitsunday Islands.

rainforest.description: A stream in the La Selva region of the Costa Rican rain forest, taken during NASA's AirSAR 2004 campaign.
